ABOUT_US_MESSAGE:
This museum is a fake one. It has been build just to show the possibilities that we offer.

If you want to contact us, send an email to franciscojavierbolivarlupianez@gmail.com and we will answer you as quick as possible.

Our location is fictitious too, so that's the reason you can see the pointer in the Pacific Ocean.
ENTER_CODE_MESSAGE: Please, enter a code to continue
ENTER_CODE_BAD_INPUT: Sorry, the entered code is not valid
HOME_DESCRIPTION: Museumator is an ionic app to build custom multimedia museum apps. If you need a multimedia and multiplatform app for your museum you are one step away for getting it. Just contact us! We are Museumator, we build culture, we build you and everybody around you.
NO_AUDIO_BROWSER_SUPPORT: Your browser does not support the audio element
